name: Boorglars
description:
You don't have a gun. You own a flashlight. You are the only security guard of the whole museum. During the night, the lights go out. That's when the burglars come. They wanna steal your art. Your precious art. You don't let them.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys: to run around and climb ladders
Space Bar: to jump
Esc Key: to quit the game
